mapper.sql: CHANNEL_ID, FULL_NAME, ABBR_NAME, CONTRACT_ID, OP_STATUS, CONTACTOR, TEL, EMAIL, QQ, API_KEY, API_PWD
mapper.insert: insert into t_channel (CHANNEL_ID, FULL_NAME, ABBR_NAME, CONTRACT_ID, OP_STATUS, CONTACTOR, TEL, EMAIL, QQ, API_KEY, API_PWD) values (#{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abbrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apiKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apiPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_channel
CHANNEL_ID,
FULL_NAME,
ABBR_NAME,
CONTRACT_ID,
OP_STATUS,
CONTACTOR,
TEL,
EMAIL,
QQ,
API_KEY,
API_PWD,

mapper.update:
update t_channel
FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABBR_NAME = #{abbrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_STATUS = #{opStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CONTACTOR = #{contactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
API_KEY = #{apiKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
API_PWD = #{apiPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_channel set FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABBR_NAME = #{abbrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_STATUS = #{opStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONTACTOR = #{contactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, API_KEY = #{apiKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, API_PWD = #{apiPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT c.CHANNEL_ID, c.FULL_NAME,c.API_KEY FROM t_user_channel u,t_channel c WHERE u.CHANNEL_ID = c.CHANNEL_ID AND u.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
